name: Only in Russia
description:
Little Russian Matryoshka dolls were promised vodka if they manage to climb to the top of this tower of nonsense. The trick is that there is no top. Strategically position and rotate falling blocks, avoid filling up your screen vertically, and watch the Matryoshka dolls climb higher and higher.

A Slavic Game Jam 2019 game by
  • Iwo Bujkiewicz / Outfrost (itch.io) - programming
  • Rewol - design, 3D art

With amazing help from

  • Radim Jelínek / Jelrad (twitter) - 3D art
  • Narek Papoyan (soundcloud) - music

Jam theme was "GROWTH". There were no requirements or restrictions on engines, tools, genres, etc.

Controls

[A] [⭠] - Move block left
[D] [⭢] - Move block right
[S] [⭣] [Space] - Drop block down
[E] [⭡] - Rotate block
[Enter] - Restart game

Gamepad controls are also available, but haven't been tested. Try them if you want, and tell us if they're broken :P
